item.title: 中国贸易特使会见美国代表团，美国农作物市场上涨
item.description: 在中国宣布其贸易特使会见了美国中西部政界和商界领袖代表团后，美国大部分农作物市场走高。【原文：Most US crop markets traded higher following an announcement from China that a trade envoy from the nation met with a delegation of US political and business leaders from the Midwest.】

item.title: Nexstar 与 Sinclair 联合抵制 Kimmel 的深夜节目
item.description: Nexstar Media Group Inc. 表示，它将与 ABC 电视台的另一家大所有者辛克莱公司（Sinclair Inc.【原文：Nexstar Media Group Inc. said it would join Sinclair Inc., another large owner of ABC TV stations, in preempting Jimmy Kimmel Live! on Tuesday night.】

item.title: 欧洲央行奇波罗内称数字欧元可能在 2029 年中期推出
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）表示，随着为启动这一旷日持久的项目而做出的努力不断加强，数字欧元可能会在2029年成为现实。【原文：The digital euro could become a reality in 2029 as efforts intensify to get the long-running project off the ground, according to European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 普利兹克计划在特朗普政策影响下削减伊利诺伊州开支
item.description: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克（JB Pritzker）正在命令州政府机构想方设法削减开支，以应对唐纳德-特朗普总统政策带来的经济影响。【原文：Illinois Governor JB Pritzker is ordering state agencies to find ways to cut spending as he girds for the economic fallout from President Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 埃特尔表示，欧盟银行监管机构计划迅速提高效率
item.description: 欧洲银行管理局正计划提高监管效率，并赋予监督贷款机构的监察机构更多的自由裁量权。【原文：The European Banking Authority is planning to boost the efficiency of regulation and give more discretion to watchdogs who oversee lenders.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克表示担心通胀，并预计通胀将进一步加剧
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他认为未来会出现更多通胀，强调美国央行需要继续警惕物价上涨压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he sees more inflation coming, underscoring that the US central bank needs to remain on guard against price pressures.】

item.title: 微软转向微流控领域为人工智能芯片降温
item.description:
少量流体通过蚀刻在芯片上的通道，可节约能源并提升人工智能系统的性能。【原文：

Small amounts of fluid passed through channels etched on chips can save energy and boost AI systems.

】

item.title: 南非与中国企业签署促进贸易协议
item.description: 中国呼吁深化与南非的贸易和投资关系，并承诺加快工业化、农业和市场准入方面的合作。【原文：China called for deeper trade and investment ties with South Africa as it pledged to accelerate cooperation in industrialization, agriculture and market access.】

item.title: 德桑蒂斯提议将特朗普总统图书馆选址迈阿密
item.description: 佛罗里达州州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）正在采取措施，将未来的唐纳德-特朗普总统图书馆搬到迈阿密市中心。【原文：Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is taking steps to bring a future Donald Trump presidential library to downtown Miami.】

item.title: 沙特 Airbnb 竞争对手在募集 7200 万美元资金后着眼于 2028 年上市
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯度假租赁公司 Gathern 首席执行官 Latifah Altamimi 表示，在获得 7200 万美元的 B 轮融资后，该公司计划于 2028 年首次公开募股。【原文：Saudi Arabian vacation rental company Gathern is targeting an initial public offering in 2028 after securing $72 million in Series B funding, according to Chief Executive Officer Latifah Altamimi.】

item.title: 美国农民陷入困境，巴西准备再种大豆
item.description: 对于美国大豆种植者来说，这是一个暗淡的收获季节，大豆价格接近多年低点，而且没有一船大豆销往中国。现在，巴西生产商正加紧扩大种植面积，并有可能涌入市场，另一种威胁迫在眉睫。【原文：It’s a bleak harvest season for US soybean farmers, with prices near multi-year lows and not a single cargo sold to China. Now another threat is looming as Brazilian producers gear up to expand plantings and possibly flood the market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行科切尔希望限制欧洲金融规则的增长
item.description: 奥地利央行行长表示，随着加密资产等业务的兴起，人们要求制定更多的标准，欧洲应严格控制金融规则的制定。【原文：Europe should keep a tight rein on financial rule-making as the rise of businesses like crypto assets leads to demands for yet more standards, Austria’s central-bank chief said.】

item.title: 加拿大股市再创新高，突破 30,000 点关键水平
item.description: 尽管面临关税威胁和经济疲软，加拿大股市仍创下历史新高。【原文：Canadian stocks hit a new all-time high despite tariff threats and a weakening economy.】

item.title: 交易员寻求美联储鲍威尔的信号，美国股市保持稳定
item.description: 在本周晚些时候公布通胀数据之前，交易员们正在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的讲话。【原文：The record-breaking rally in US stocks took a breather on Tuesday as traders awaited a speech from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell ahead of inflation data due later in the week.】

item.title: 美国商业活动降温，销售价格增长放缓
item.description: 9 月份，美国商业活动的扩张速度为三个月来最慢，而需求降温限制了企业提高价格和抵消关税的能力。【原文：US business activity expanded in September at the slowest pace in three months, while cooler demand limited the ability of companies to raise prices and offset tariffs.】

item.title: 利率 "Volmaggedon "重创华尔街备受喜爱的尾部对冲工具
item.description: 美国利率波动性的急剧下降，使华尔街流行的一种对冲金融市场动荡的方法痛苦不堪。【原文：A rapid plunge in US interest-rate volatility is heaping pain on a popular Wall Street approach for hedging against financial market turmoil.】

item.title: 摩洛哥延长利率暂停期，中东局势岌岌可危
item.description: 摩洛哥连续第二个季度维持利率不变，在中东地区紧张局势加剧的情况下，继续警惕通胀风险。【原文：Morocco left interest rates unchanged for a second quarter, remaining on guard for inflationary risks as tensions simmer in the broader Middle East.】

item.title: 联合足球联盟获前卡莱尔首席执行官李投资
item.description: 联合足球联盟获得了凯雷集团前首席执行官 Kewsong Lee 创办的一家公司的战略投资。【原文：The United Soccer League has received a strategic investment from a firm founded by Kewsong Lee, the former chief executive officer of Carlyle Group.】

item.title: 沙特大力推动股票发行，使股票摆脱地方控制
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯在推动重振表现不佳的股票市场方面，将采取迄今为止最引人注目的举措之一：允许外国人拥有当地公司的多数股权。【原文：Saudi Arabia is set to make one of the most dramatic moves yet in its push to revive its underperforming equity market: allowing foreigners to own a majority stake in local companies.】

item.title: 尼日利亚五年来首次降息
item.description: 在通胀放缓和奈拉近期走强的背景下，尼日利亚中央银行自 2020 年科维德-19 大流行病以来首次下调了关键利率。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank cut its key interest rate for the first time since the Covid-19 pandemic in 2020, amid slowing inflation and a recent strengthening in the naira.】

item.title: EDP 称美国可再生能源在海上风电遭遇挫折后 "更加稳定
item.description: 葡萄牙公用事业公司 EDP SA 表示，投资美国可再生能源的前景已变得更加明朗，缓解了唐纳德-特朗普就任总统头几个月后的担忧。【原文：Portuguese utility EDP SA says the outlook for investing in US renewable energy has become significantly clearer, easing concerns that followed the first months of Donald Trump’s presidency.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称 FOMC 需要采取果断行动支持就业
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，随着劳动力市场的疲软，政策制定者面临落后于曲线的危险，需要果断采取行动降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said policymakers are in danger of falling behind the curve and need to act decisively to bring down interest rates as the labor market weakens.】

item.title: 谷歌利用移动人工智能游戏代理和联盟吸引玩家
item.description: 谷歌正在推出一款人工智能助手，可以为手机游戏玩家提供实时指导，这也是谷歌为提高安卓平台参与度所做努力的一部分。【原文：Google is introducing an artificial intelligence assistant that can offer live coaching to mobile gamers, part of a larger effort to boost engagement on its Android platform.】

item.title: 亚马逊因取消 Prime 索赔案进入 FTC 陪审团审判阶段
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）和三位高管在西雅图法院面临联邦监管机构的指控，称他们欺骗客户注册该公司的 Prime 订阅服务，然后又让客户难以取消。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. and three executives are facing a federal regulator’s allegations in a Seattle court that they duped customers into signing up for the company’s Prime subscription service and then made it too hard to cancel.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，Stellantis 将暂停工厂生产
item.description: Stellantis NV 将暂时停止意大利和法国工厂的生产，原因是包括阿尔法-罗密欧 Tonale 运动型多用途车在内的车型需求滞后。【原文：Stellantis NV will temporarily halt production at plants in Italy and France, amid lagging demand for models including the Alfa Romeo Tonale sport utility vehicle.】

item.title: 特朗普计划以基于工资的规则取代 H-1B 抽签
item.description: 特朗普政府正在提议对科技行业大量使用的 H-1B 签证的遴选程序进行重大改革，根据职位所需的技能水平和提供的工资来分配，而不是目前的随机抽签。【原文：The Trump administration is proposing a major overhaul of the selection process for H-1B visas heavily used by the tech industry, basing allocation on skill-level required and wages offered for a position instead of the current randomized lottery.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比称通胀决定了谨慎的降息步伐
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，鉴于通胀率高于目标且处于上升轨道，美国央行应谨慎对待进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the US central bank should be cautious toward additional interest-rate reductions given inflation is above its target and on an upward trajectory.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油流量因产量增加和袭击事件创 16 个月新高
item.description:
四周平均出货量创 2024 年 5 月以来新高

Four-week average shipments reach the highest since May 2024

】

item.title: 醒醒吧"：银行首席执行官敦促卡尼以激进减税对抗美国
item.description: 加拿大国家银行（National Bank of Canada）高层呼吁加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）考虑大胆减税并放松对战略性行业的管制，以提高该国的生产力和竞争力。【原文：National Bank of Canada’s top executive called on Prime Minister Mark Carney to consider bold tax cuts and deregulation for strategic sectors to boost the country’s productivity and competitiveness.】

item.title: 劳氏启动五部分债券销售，为收购 FBM 提供资金
item.description: 本周二，Lowe's Cos Inc. 将与美国投资级债务市场上其他至少七家潜在发行人一道，分五部分出售美元债券，以帮助为其收购 Foundation Building Materials 公司提供资金。【原文：Lowe’s Cos Inc. is selling dollar-denominated bonds in five parts to help fund its acquisition of Foundation Building Materials, joining at least seven other potential issuers in the US investment-grade debt market on Tuesday.】
